wpPost.title: D Day minus one
wpPost.content:
Suspense, spares and packing.

Tomorrow at 0700 the three disturbed cavaliers embark on leg three, the final stage of the circumnavigation of the UK on the 50 Cubs.

Check list –

  1. Hang, draw and service cubs 
  2. Prepare spares kit and lecture non-compliant spare tire.
  3. Upload and update Monkeynav
  4. Collect hire van
  5. Load Cubs into van
  6. Pack panniers
  7. Give Bowie bogus departure time

Daily blogs will follow, after traveling to the leg two finish point in Exeter tomorrow we unload the cubs and ride 75 miles to our first nights stop over.

A big push to raise as much as we can for Blood Bikes Cumbria and Eden Vally Hospice Jigsaw fund is out aim. We ask for your continued sponsorship, support and input
